function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"CO2 concentration as a sole indicator for airborne infection risk","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of air flushing in reducing particle concentrations","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty in controlling ventilation rate for natural ventilation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation rates in high-occupancy buildings leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse outcomes of increasing ventilation rate, including indoor discomfort, higher energy consumption, and increased CO2 emissions","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ventilation alone cannot prevent indoor airborne transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hvac interventions reducing airborne transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation rates in facilities","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective building measures for virus mitigation","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality control leading to pathogen transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission mechanisms leading to errors in quarantine site selection and controls","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor infection control in constructed environments leading to high transmission rates of respiratory viruses","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bats as native host of covid-19","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission and infectious incubation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated medical waste mixing with domestic waste","category":"Waste","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excess of chlorine in water could generate harmful effects on people’s health","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in domestic and medical waste","category":"Waste","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in organic and inorganic waste due to online shopping and medical waste","category":"Waste","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in waste recycling due to concerns about covid-19 transmission","category":"Waste","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drop of pm 2.5 in large parts of china","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in domestic waste due to online food ordering and use of single-use packaging","category":"Waste","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of air pollution on global mortality ","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased concentrations of no2 and pm2.5 due to quarantine measures","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of recycling programs due to virus spread concerns","category":"Waste","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in noise levels due to reduced transportation and commercial activities","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive indirect effects of covid-19 on the environment","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative indirect effects of covid-19 on the environment","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in ghg emissions during a short period","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to the internet in rural areas may hinder the evaluation of residents’ knowledge, attitudes, and practices related to covid-19.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential risky behavior related to food serving alone due to unemployment and inability to afford personal protective equipment like facemasks","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underrepresentation of certain regions in the study","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large number of participants from all indonesian regions.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using online methods to collect data during a stay-at-home regulation period.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex temporal role of urban density in the spread of the virus","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High urban density and crowding may contribute to increased transmission of contagious diseases due to close proximity and frequent interaction among people.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of exposure for medical staff during blood drawing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sample transfer and delivery of medicines","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of UV light devices for surface disinfection may not reach all surfaces or provide consistent coverage, leading to incomplete disinfection.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating thermal sensors and vision algorithms onto autonomous or remotely operated robots for temperature screening may lead to inaccurate or misleading results.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure of frontline health care practitioners to contagious pathogens through direct patient contact.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in existing properties","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surface-to-person transmission via contact with infected surfaces or objects","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission via direct contact or airborne respiratory droplets","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of poor indoor environmental quality on health and well-being","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of sewage samples","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to properly disinfect the work area","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential presence of SARS-CoV-2 in unfiltered sewage samples","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 signal in PEG-precipitated filtrate fraction","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of viral signal in solid materials on the filter","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of wastewater collection samples with SARS-CoV-2 virus","category":"Water","confidence":"High"}]}
